item.title: By: Kevin Ragsdale
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
Hi Jimmy,
The Error Handling videos and source code are available via the Wayback Machine. I will post them to the site as well. Unfortunately, it looks like the other videos are not available.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jimmy,

The Error Handling videos and source code are available via the Wayback Machine. I will post them to the site as well. Unfortunately, it looks like the other videos are not available.

item.title: By: Jimmy Tan
item.dc:creator: Jimmy Tan
item.description: Oh no. Any chance you can recover the excellent vfp tutorials (flash) parts 1 to 3. I always go back to it as a reference. Here's hoping.
item.content:encoded:
Oh no. Any chance you can recover the excellent vfp tutorials (flash) parts 1 to 3.
I always go back to it as a reference. Here’s hoping.

item.title: By: Enviar SMS desde Visual Foxpro mediante LleidaNET | David Acuña Guzman Blog
item.dc:creator: Enviar SMS desde Visual Foxpro mediante LleidaNET | David Acuña Guzman Blog
item.description: […] Obtener la librería VFPConnection.FLL. Creada por Craig Boyd, permite hacer un Callback desde la función FLL, para saber el progreso del envío. La librería puede descargarse desde el blog de Kevin Ragsdale aquí. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Obtener la librería VFPConnection.FLL. Creada por Craig Boyd, permite hacer un Callback desde la función FLL, para saber el progreso del envío. La librería puede descargarse desde el blog de Kevin Ragsdale aquí. […]

item.title: By: Mike Potjer
item.dc:creator: Mike Potjer
item.description: Thanks for making sure these useful functions don't disappear from the internet. Coincidentally, I was just working on a wrapper for the VFPEncryption library today.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for making sure these useful functions don’t disappear from the internet. Coincidentally, I was just working on a wrapper for the VFPEncryption library today.
